channel.title: I need help with emotes
channel.description: Please help me. I need help with emotes, like vengeance i wanan change it to the normal skull like real runescape. how do i do that? someone please help me. :(

item.title: I need help with emotes
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Do you have a client? You cannot have the “rs vengeance skull” in a silab server.
You should have the emotes/gfx’s in your server folder somewhere, they are usually in “tools”.

EDIT: The code is in client.java under the thing you want to change.
Example:

case 162:
                    if (actionTimer == 0) {
                            actionTimer = 30;
			    if (playerLevel[6] >= 93)
                            stillgfx(83, absY, absX);
                            for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) {
                                strPot = true;
                                strPotTimer = 90;
                                cba = abc / 10;
                                abc2 = cba * 2;
                                if (abc2 <= 1) { 
                                    abc2 = 2;
                                }
                                updateRequired = true;
                                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                                break;
                            }
                            inCombat();
                            attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
                            setAnimation(1979);   
                            txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!";
                            string4UpdateRequired = true;
                             RemoveAllWindows();
             sendMessage("Your opponent is hit with vengeance!");
             } else {
                  sendMessage("You must wait 30 seconds before casting vengeance again!");
}
		break;

This is my vengeance case.
You can use this if you want, modify it, whatever you like.

setAnimation(1979);

The 1979 is the emote I want it to do.

Read full topic
